alterego_mod:Cooking.NAME: Cooking
alterego_mod:Cooking.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Apply 1 Poison. NL Exhaust.
alterego_mod:Cooking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Apply 2 Poison. NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Birthday.NAME: Birthday
alterego_mod:Birthday.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.
alterego_mod:Birthday.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Maid.NAME: Maid
alterego_mod:Maid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Lose 1 Dexterity.

alterego_mod:Venus.NAME: Venus
alterego_mod:Venus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.
alterego_mod:Venus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

alterego_mod:Swimsuit.NAME: Swimsuit
alterego_mod:Swimsuit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable and !M! Frail.

alterego_mod:Pet.NAME: Pet
alterego_mod:Pet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card.

alterego_mod:Belts.NAME: Belts
alterego_mod:Belts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Whenever you attack this enemy, gain alterego_mod:Best Of X Block. NL Exhaust.
alterego_mod:Belts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Whenever you attack this enemy, gain alterego_mod:Best Of 2X Block. NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:PresenceConcealment.NAME: Presence Concealment
alterego_mod:PresenceConcealment.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next X turns.
alterego_mod:PresenceConcealment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next X+2 turns.

alterego_mod:Lift.NAME: Lift
alterego_mod:Lift.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for every !M! HP you're missing.

alterego_mod:BiFurious.NAME: Bi-Furious
alterego_mod:BiFurious.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength this turn. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

alterego_mod:1TonWallop.NAME: 1 Ton Wallop
alterego_mod:1TonWallop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Take 4 damage.

alterego_mod:Mirror.NAME: Mirror
alterego_mod:Mirror.DESCRIPTION: Perform the enemy's intent on them.
alterego_mod:Mirror.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Perform the enemy's intent on ALL enemies.

alterego_mod:SakuraPetals.NAME: Sakura Petals
alterego_mod:SakuraPetals.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

alterego_mod:BigMeatyClaws.NAME: Big Meaty Claws
alterego_mod:BigMeatyClaws.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL Add X *Shivs to your hand.
alterego_mod:BigMeatyClaws.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL Add X+2 *Shivs to your hand.

alterego_mod:ClassAdvantage.NAME: Class Advantage
alterego_mod:ClassAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Deal 10% more damge. NL Take 10% less damage.
alterego_mod:ClassAdvantage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 15% more damge. NL Take 15% less damage.

alterego_mod:PainIsPleasure.NAME: Pain is Pleasure
alterego_mod:PainIsPleasure.DESCRIPTION: Taking damage instead heals you this turn.

alterego_mod:IdEs.NAME: Id_es
alterego_mod:IdEs.DESCRIPTION: Play every card in your exhaust pile (except *Id_es). NL Exhaust.
alterego_mod:IdEs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play every card in your exhaust pile (except *Id_es). NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Clones.NAME: "Clones"
alterego_mod:Clones.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of a card in your hand to your hand. The copy gains Retain.
alterego_mod:Clones.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add two copies of a card in your hand to your hand. The copies gain Retain.

alterego_mod:RidiculouslyBig.NAME: Ridiculously Big
alterego_mod:RidiculouslyBig.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Reduce the amount by 4 until the end of combat; Exhaust if it reaches 0.

alterego_mod:Clap.NAME: Clap
alterego_mod:Clap.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL This turn, your next Attack is played twice.
alterego_mod:Clap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL This turn, your next two Attacks are played twice.

alterego_mod:Cushion.NAME: Cushion
alterego_mod:Cushion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust. NL Shuffle a *Cushion into your draw pile.

alterego_mod:DeftHands.NAME: Deft Hands
alterego_mod:DeftHands.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL In alterego_mod:Durga, gain 1 Dexterity. NL In alterego_mod:Brynhildr, gain !B! Block. NL In alterego_mod:Parvati, your and the enemy's next attacks deal 1 more damage.

alterego_mod:DustData.NAME: Dust Data
alterego_mod:DustData.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Kill a non-boss enemy. NL Become cursed: *Regret.
alterego_mod:DustData.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Kill a non-boss enemy.

alterego_mod:BrynhildrsRune.NAME: Brynhildr's Rune
alterego_mod:BrynhildrsRune.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !B! Block.

alterego_mod:BrynhildrRomantia.NAME: Brynhildr Romantia
alterego_mod:BrynhildrRomantia.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, raise your Max HP by !M!.

alterego_mod:PerceptionDisorder.NAME: Perception Disorder
alterego_mod:PerceptionDisorder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL You won't see enemy intents until the end of combat.

alterego_mod:Punishment.NAME: Punishment
alterego_mod:Punishment.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, gain [E]. NL At the end of each turn, lose 1 HP for each card in your hand.
alterego_mod:Punishment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each turn, gain [E]. NL At the end of each turn, lose 1 HP for every 2 cards in your hand.

alterego_mod:BeGentle.NAME: Be Gentle
alterego_mod:BeGentle.DESCRIPTION: Enemy heals !M! and loses its action this turn.

alterego_mod:Schoolgirl.NAME: Schoolgirl
alterego_mod:Schoolgirl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand this turn. NL Gain !M! Dexterity.

alterego_mod:PurpleHair.NAME: Purple Hair
alterego_mod:PurpleHair.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Block, gain 1 Thorns for every !M! lost. NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Tantrum.NAME: Tantrum
alterego_mod:Tantrum.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL Your attacks deal double damage for 3 turns.

alterego_mod:Valkyrie.NAME: Valkyrie
alterego_mod:Valkyrie.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !M! Regen.

alterego_mod:GIGAMILK.NAME: GIGA MILK
alterego_mod:GIGAMILK.DESCRIPTION: ALL COMBATANTS GAIN STRENGTH EQUAL TO YOUR STRENGTH.
alterego_mod:GIGAMILK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL COMBATANTS GAIN STRENGTH EQUAL TO YOUR STRENGTH. NL (excluding target enemy)

alterego_mod:Stockings.NAME: Stockings
alterego_mod:Stockings.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak, twice.

alterego_mod:DiscoLights.NAME: Disco Lights
alterego_mod:DiscoLights.DESCRIPTION: Every other time you play a *Shiv, gain !M! Temporary_HP.
alterego_mod:DiscoLights.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time you play a *Shiv, gain !M! Temporary_HP.

alterego_mod:BoobPocket.NAME: Boob Pocket
alterego_mod:BoobPocket.DESCRIPTION: Purge a card from your hand. NL Startup: alterego_mod:Swipe all cards this purged last combat.

alterego_mod:HighServant.NAME: High Servant
alterego_mod:HighServant.DESCRIPTION: alterego_mod:Swipe a card that would change your Stance.

alterego_mod:IndependentAction.NAME: Independent Action
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: . NL Increase this card's energy gain by 1 until the end of combat.

alterego_mod:Impale.NAME: Impale
alterego_mod:Impale.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Parvati. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL Enemy gains 2 Strength. NL Deal !D! damage.
alterego_mod:Impale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Parvati. NL Gain 3 Strength. NL Enemy gains 1 Strength. NL Deal !D! damage.

alterego_mod:Collar.NAME: Collar
alterego_mod:Collar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.

alterego_mod:BusterCard.NAME: Buster Card
alterego_mod:BusterCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard pile. NL If this is the third *Buster *Card you've played this turn, double your Strength.
alterego_mod:BusterCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard pile. NL If this is the third *Buster *Card you've played this turn, triple your Strength.

alterego_mod:BustOut.NAME: Bust Out
alterego_mod:BustOut.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Block, heal that much. NL Lose all Dexterity, gain that much Strength.

alterego_mod:GachaTicket.NAME: Gacha Ticket
alterego_mod:GachaTicket.DESCRIPTION: The next time you play a card of a random type this turn, it is played twice.

alterego_mod:Nekomimi.NAME: Nekomimi
alterego_mod:Nekomimi.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each of your turns, gain 1 Dexterity.

alterego_mod:Lingerie.NAME: Lingerie
alterego_mod:Lingerie.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Parvati. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable.

alterego_mod:Belle.NAME: Belle
alterego_mod:Belle.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Deal damage equal to your gold.
alterego_mod:Belle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Deal damage equal to your gold. NL Startup: Gain 5 gold.

alterego_mod:Bloomers.NAME: Bloomers
alterego_mod:Bloomers.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL If it was a curse or status, draw 2.
alterego_mod:Bloomers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to 2 cards. NL Draw 2 for each curse or status exhausted.

alterego_mod:Bunnysuit.NAME: Bunnysuit
alterego_mod:Bunnysuit.DESCRIPTION: Discard five cards, draw that many.
alterego_mod:Bunnysuit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard up to five cards, draw that many.

alterego_mod:TrashNCrash.NAME: Trash & Crash
alterego_mod:TrashNCrash.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards, gain !M! Strength for each card exhausted.

alterego_mod:DestructionOfProperty.NAME: Destruction of Property
alterego_mod:DestructionOfProperty.DESCRIPTION: Remove a random power from all combatants.
alterego_mod:DestructionOfProperty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove X random powers from all combatants.

alterego_mod:Valentines.NAME: Valentine's
alterego_mod:Valentines.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr. NL Clear a random debuff.
alterego_mod:Valentines.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Enter alterego_mod:Brynhildr. NL Clear ALL debuffs.

alterego_mod:BreastValley.NAME: Breast Valley
alterego_mod:BreastValley.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is exhausted, gain X+ !M! Block.
alterego_mod:BreastValley.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is exhausted, gain X+ !M! Block. NL Refund 1.

alterego_mod:Alter.NAME: Alter
alterego_mod:Alter.DESCRIPTION: Flip your HP. NL Take 50% more damage this combat. NL Exhaust.
alterego_mod:Alter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Flip your HP. NL Take 25% more damage this combat. NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Rake.NAME: Rake
alterego_mod:Rake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses 1 Strength and Dexterity at the end of each of its turns.

alterego_mod:VirginLaserPalladion.NAME: Virgin Laser - Palladion
alterego_mod:VirginLaserPalladion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage, ignoring all modifiers and impediments.

alterego_mod:InsideBaseball.NAME: Inside Baseball
alterego_mod:InsideBaseball.DESCRIPTION: The first non-boss enemy to attack you this turn flees with 30 gold.
alterego_mod:InsideBaseball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first non-boss enemy to attack you flees with 30 gold.

alterego_mod:SideboobHour.NAME: The Sideboob Hour
alterego_mod:SideboobHour.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your run time in minutes.

alterego_mod:Weigh.NAME: Weigh
alterego_mod:Weigh.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your breasts' combined weight in kilograms.
alterego_mod:Weigh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your breasts' combined weight in pounds.

alterego_mod:Santa.NAME: Santa
alterego_mod:Santa.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Add a random card to your hand. NL It's common if X=1. NL It's uncommon if X=2. NL It's rare if X=3+. NL Refund X-3.
alterego_mod:Santa.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Add a random card to your hand. It costs 1 less until played. NL It's common if X=1. NL It's uncommon if X=2. NL It's rare if X=3+. NL Refund X-3.

alterego_mod:Support.NAME: Support
alterego_mod:Support.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play an Attack this turn, gain !M! Dexterity.

alterego_mod:Rip.NAME: Ripped
alterego_mod:Rip.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Gain 1 Strength and 1 Frail.
alterego_mod:Rip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Gain 1 Strength and 1 Frail. NL Your next Attack deals 5 additional damage.

alterego_mod:Crossover.NAME: Crossover
alterego_mod:Crossover.DESCRIPTION: Add a random card from another character to your hand.

alterego_mod:Table.NAME: Rest on Table
alterego_mod:Table.DESCRIPTION: Give a card Retain until the end of combat.
alterego_mod:Table.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give a card Retain until the end of combat. The card costs 1 less each time it is Retained.

alterego_mod:SuperDuperMasochism.NAME: Super Duper Masochism
alterego_mod:SuperDuperMasochism.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Parvati. NL Gain 1 Strength for every !M! damage you take this turn.

alterego_mod:Antipathy.NAME: Antipathy
alterego_mod:Antipathy.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Parvati. NL Gain !M! alterego_mod:Temp. Invincible.

alterego_mod:STier.NAME: S Tier
alterego_mod:STier.DESCRIPTION: Add a random alterego_mod:S Tier card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
alterego_mod:STier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add two random alterego_mod:S Tier cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:Exercise.NAME: Exercise
alterego_mod:Exercise.DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL Deal 5 damage. NL If you have positive Strength, play this card once more.
alterego_mod:Exercise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enter alterego_mod:Durga. NL Deal 5 damage. NL If you have positive Strength or were already in alterego_mod:Durga, play this card once more.

alterego_mod:Undulate.NAME: Undulate
alterego_mod:Undulate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you change Stances, return this from the Discard Pile to your hand.

alterego_mod:AlterEgo.NAME: Alter-Ego
alterego_mod:AlterEgo.DESCRIPTION: Starting next turn: NL Attacks cost 1 less on odd-numbered turns; NL Skills cost 1 less on even-numbered turns.
alterego_mod:AlterEgo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Starting next turn: NL Attacks and Skills cost 1 less.

alterego_mod:Vow.NAME: Vow
alterego_mod:Vow.DESCRIPTION: Target dies when any enemy dies. NL Purge.
alterego_mod:Vow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target dies when any enemy dies. NL Exhaust.

alterego_mod:RingBreak.NAME: Ring Break
alterego_mod:RingBreak.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your block is broken, your next attack deals additional damage equal to the unblocked damage you took.

alterego_mod:TrickOrTreatment.NAME: Trick or Treatment
alterego_mod:TrickOrTreatment.DESCRIPTION: Choose between gaining !M! Regen or 1 alterego_mod:Envenom.
alterego_mod:TrickOrTreatment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose between gaining !M! Regen or 2 alterego_mod:Envenom.

alterego_mod:Cycle.NAME: Cycle
alterego_mod:Cycle.DESCRIPTION: Change Stance: NL alterego_mod:Durga to alterego_mod:Parvati. NL alterego_mod:Parvati to alterego_mod:Brynhildr. NL alterego_mod:Brynhildr to alterego_mod:Durga.
alterego_mod:Cycle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Change Stance: NL alterego_mod:Durga to alterego_mod:Parvati. NL alterego_mod:Parvati to alterego_mod:Brynhildr. NL alterego_mod:Brynhildr to alterego_mod:Durga. NL None to Calm.
